courses.title: Guitar Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of guitar playing, including chords, strumming patterns, and simple songs.

courses.title: Piano for Beginners
courses.description: An introductory course to piano playing, covering basic techniques and music theory.

courses.title: Drum Basics
courses.description: A comprehensive course on drumming techniques, rhythms, and patterns.

courses.title: Music Theory 101
courses.description: Understand the fundamentals of music theory, including scales, chords, and harmony.

courses.title: Advanced Guitar Techniques
courses.description: Take your guitar playing to the next level with advanced techniques and styles.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation
courses.description: Learn the art of jazz improvisation, including scales, modes, and chord progressions.
